name: Poltergeist Heist (FireSquid)
description:
The king has locked you (a ghost) and your other ghost friend in the dungeon. Can you escape from your prison? This game was made in Godot in one week for Godot Wild Jam #43.

Theme: Combine

Wildcards Used: Click-Me!, The More the Merrier

Credits:

FireSquid- Programming, gameplay design, level design

Ramita - Sound design, level design

Pixel Castle Tileset by Disven used for assets

If the game isn't loading, you can also play it on my website here: https://firesquid.co/GWJ43/index.html
